titles.title: A bill to designate Jackson, Perry, and Randolph Counties in Illinois as a single metropolitan statistical area.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 3/8/1988--Introduced. Directs that the Illinois counties of Jackson, Perry, and Randolph be designated a single metropolitan statistical area by the Director of the Office of Management and Budget.
